name: Ultratumba
description:
Ultratumba is a puzzle game where you can play against a friend or the computer.

Your objective is to find hte "fulanito", a shy elusive character. He is hidden in a arranged 10x10 cemetery, but the skeletons in the graves sometimes will indicate the "fulanito" direction.

Experience

Ultratumba have EXPERIENCES, an achievement open library designed for GP2X and PC. You can win this achievements (500 points, 15 exps) if you install the Exp Application.

Language

English and Spanish.

Controls GAMEPADKEYSDIRECTIONSTICKCURSORSACTIONA/B/XZ/X/ALANGUAGEYS
